docs.snippet: U.S.-born Chris Wyles, an offensive force for the powerful Saracens of Premiership Rugby in England, says Saturday's ground-breaking match against London Irish can be a big step for growing the game in America....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S.-born Chris Wyles, an offensive force for the powerful Saracens of Premiership Rugby in England, says Saturday's ground-breaking match against London Irish can be a big step for growing the game in America.

headline.main: Saracens Keen to Play Part in Growing Rugby in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Saracens Keen to Play Part in Growing Rugby in U.S.

docs.snippet: The Internet giant, which just named two new board directors, has to continue to try to execute a turnaround, even while potential bidders look to buy some or all its parts....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Internet giant, which just named two new board directors, has to continue to try to execute a turnaround, even while potential bidders look to buy some or all its parts.
docs.abstract: Yahoo names Catherine J Friedman and Eric K Brandt to its board.

headline.main: Yahoo Labors to Carry On With Core Business While Exploring Sale
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Labors to Carry On With Core Business While Exploring a Sale

byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

docs.snippet: Whether you call it running out the clock, playing keep-away or working the pitcher’s count, Mr. Trump was looking to escape the last face-off before the March 15 states hold their primaries having done as little harm to himself as possible....
docs.abstract: Whether you call it running out the clock, playing keep-away or working the pitcher’s count, Mr. Trump was looking to escape the last face-off before the March 15 states hold their primaries having done as little harm to himself as possible.

headline.main: In Republican Debate, Donald Trump Looks to Run Out the Clock

docs.snippet: The state dinner for Canada’s prime minister included celebrity guests born in his country, such as Ryan Reynolds, Sandra Oh, Michael J. Fox and Mike Myers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The state dinner for Canada’s prime minister included celebrity guests born in his country, such as Ryan Reynolds, Sandra Oh, Michael J. Fox and Mike Myers.
docs.abstract: White House state dinner honoring Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau and his family goes smoothly, contrasting with two controversial visits made by his father, former Canadian Prime Min Pierre Trudeau, in 1969 and 1977.

headline.main: Justin Trudeau’s White House Dinner Has the Air of a Family Reunion
headline.print_headline: A State Dinner at the White House Has the Air of a Family Reunion

headline.main: Mejia Wants to Challenge Deal Not to Appeal 3rd Pos. Test
